title: Japanese trials rider Tomomi Nishikubo’s Tokyo track & field challenge, pentathlon by bike
content:
Japanese trials bike rider Tomomi Nishikubo figured he could probably match some of the best track & field athletes in the world, so he decided to complete the Pentathlon by bike. We all know what mega international sporting competition is going on in Tokyo right now, right? But no one wants to run afoul of the […]

author: Cory Benson
